data.title: Hazma: Compute indirect detection constraints on sub-GeV dark matter
data.name: Hazma
data.description: Python package for computing indirect detection constraints on sub-GeV dark matter.

evidence: "Hazma is a tool for studying indirect detection of sub-GeV dark. Its main uses are: Computing gamma-ray and electron/positron spectra from dark matter annihilations; Setting limits on sub-GeV dark matter using existing gamma-ray data; Determining the discovery reach of future gamma-ray detectors; Deriving accurate CMB constraints."
"Hazma can be installed from PyPI using: pip install hazma"
